Dracona is hit by the blast and looks back to the sky.he was gone......oh,
well...maybe he'll punish her...she laughed...... "hey, Zardus! i want to be
leader!..." she called......she turned around and ran toward the Ark,
shooting at it with her powerful fire and ice beams.......Suukie stepped out
the door.....he stared at her......she shot him but he continued to stare
meanly.......
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 09, 2000 10:09 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Zardus/Prowl::
>
> Zardus stumbles back from Dracona's shot and Injector's shot misses his
chest
> plate by an inch. Seeing the rest of the alliance act to orders, he flies
> back toward the alliance base. At the edge of the battle field, he turns
> around, firing another shot at Dracona. He turns and flies away.
>
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>
> Prowl looks in the direction the alliance flew off to. He sighs in relief.
At
> least they were not all dead. He lifts Iron Raptor to his shoulder. "Come
on,
> let's get you to a CR chamber." He says, heading off toward the CR
chamber,
> half carrying Iron Raptor.
